class.name: SkeletonModification3DStackHolder
class.brief_description: A modification that holds and executes a [SkeletonModificationStack3D].
class.description: This [SkeletonModification3D] holds a reference to a [SkeletonModificationStack3D], allowing you to use multiple modification stacks on a single [Skeleton3D]. [b]Note:[/b] The modifications in the held [SkeletonModificationStack3D] will only be executed if their execution mode matches the execution mode of the SkeletonModification3DStackHolder.

method.name: get_held_modification_stack
method.description: Returns the [SkeletonModificationStack3D] that this modification is holding.

method.name: set_held_modification_stack
method.description: Sets the [SkeletonModificationStack3D] that this modification is holding. This modification stack will then be executed when this modification is executed.
